generated_imgs.img_id: UUID, #key used to get presigned url for user to be able to access the image
generated_imgs.prompt: either gpt revised use REVISED:%j&# | or its just string

app_run_time.easy_shutdown: When the client boots up app, checking if the backend can be reached before doing anything. This way if in the future I can easily shut everything down
app_run_time.Sessions: JWT tokens and presigned s3 buckets lasts 3 hours
